name: Galaxy Rouge
description:
Welcome to 
Galaxy Rouge!




A small space shooter sidescroll adventure in arcade style, with 3 different levels awaits you. 




You take on the role of a small spaceship that is caught up in an alien invasion.. 






Will you manage to escape the invasion? 







Confirm your Selection in the Menu and the Pause Screen with 





Go up and down with the arrow keys  +  and fire the laser with  . 




If you need a break  
will help you. 





Collect little helpers on your way, which temporarily increase your firepower. 



  




At the end of every level there will be a boss you have to fight against. Can you defeat them all?






And who is behind the invasion?
